name: Maciej Adamczyk
story: Maciej Adamczyk was born and raised in a small town in Poland. He joined the military at a young age to serve his country and to support his family financially. Maciej is a skilled Rifleman, and his comrades consider him to be a vital member of their team. He is devoted to his wife, whom he married three years ago, and takes pride in being a loving husband. Maciej dreams of starting a family of his own but is currently focused on his duties as a soldier.
